title: iPad deals 2022: Top iPad Pro accessories on sale
description: The iPad Pro is an amazing platform for work and play, but make it even better with some great accessories.

title: AirPods Pro alternatives: Top deals 2022
description: Think noise-canceling earbuds, and most people will think Apple's AirPods or AirPods Pro. But the Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro and Buds 2 Pro are good alternatives, and you can catch these at major discounts.

title: The 5 best smart displays of 2022
description: Too many smart devices in your home can quickly become too much to handle, so a smart display can help you control all of your devices in one place. These are the best smart devices you can buy.

title: What are chat features in Android and how do you enable them?
description: Out of the box, Google Messages is missing a few important features. Find out what they are and how you can enable them.

title: The 5 best mobile VPNs
description: With many using mobile apps for financial transactions, emails, and social networking, the best mobile VPN can ensure your information remains yours.

title: AMD vs Intel: Which desktop processor is right for you?
description: The answer is a resounding "it depends," mostly on how much you want to spend.

title: How to customize the Firefox homepage on Android
description: Firefox is a great alternative browser for the Android platform that offers plenty of options, such as the customization of the homepage. Find out how you can make Firefox even better with this option.

title: Save $1,900: Free iPad, Apple Watch, and Beats if you upgrade to a 5G iPhone
description: Last chance! Verizon is extending its tablet, smartwatch, and earbuds deal for up to $1,900 in total savings. There are Samsung and Google equivalents too.

title: How to manage your Microsoft 365 subscription in Windows 11
description: You can review your Microsoft 365 plan directly in Windows 11 and easily access your Microsoft account website to manage your subscription.

title: Amazon joins Open Invention Network
description: AWS puts its patents behind the open-source and Linux patent guard OIN.

title: RHEL and its Linux relatives and rivals: How to choose
description: There's a whole family of Red Hat Enterprise Linux variants, each with its own users. We'll break down the family tree and explain what's suited for dfiferent needs.

title: Lectric XP 3.0 review: This e-bike is built for two
description: The Lectric XP 3.0 is a comfortable cruising e-bike for running errands, taking short trips, and bringing along a passenger.

title: Gaming laptop deal: Save $450 on Asus 14-inch ROG Zephyrus
description: This high-end gaming laptop typically retails for $1,650. It's refreshing to see top specs like 1BT SSD and the AMD Ryzen 9 for a lower price.

title: Why the next NFL star could be a data scientist
description: In an innovative partnership between the NFL and AWS, data scientists are being commissioned to identify player contact, incentivized by a $50,000 prize.

title: PC price cuts are coming as manufacturers rethink their portfolios
description: Economic uncertainty and decreased consumer demand are taking a toll on the tablet and PC markets. The silver lining for buyers is that excess inventory is forcing manufacturers to heavily discount prices.

title: My favorite Android phone can do things my iPhone can't, and it just got a massive upgrade
description: Looking for a rugged phone that doesn't compromise when it comes to power, performance and display quality? Check out Ulefone's Power Armor 18T.

description: The new M2 iPad Pro is a powerhouse, but that single USB-C port is very restrictive. Not anymore.

title: Apple just extended its iPhone self service repair to more countries
description: Apple now lets eight European countries fix their own iPhones, but for most it's still impractical to replace your own screen or battery.

title: You're definitely not making the most of your password manager
description: A password manager can do a lot more than store your passwords for you.

title: Top programming languages list: An unexpected change at the top
description: One of the biggest programming languages has dropped out of the top three, according to one of the lists used to track coders' favourites.

title: This badly made ransomware can't decrypt your files, even if you pay the ransom
description: Researchers warn this badly built ransomware will destroy your files, so don't pay up.

title: Artemis 1 mission: After slingshot lunar flyby, NASA's Orion is headed back to Earth
description: NASA experienced a four-hour site-wide outage at its Goldstone Deep Space Network, but it could have been much worse.

title: This 1980s programming language sparked a revolution. Now you can check out the source code

title: Arlo launches holiday sale, Essential wireless camera prices drop by $100

title: Piece this smart puzzle together for only $15 -- and win up to $1 million
description: Normally $30, this puzzle offers cash prizes -- only after you piece it together.

title: Adobe sets new guidelines for AI-generated stock images
description: While other content platforms have moved in other direction, restricting or banning AI-generated content, Adobe is trying to embrace the new art form with the right set of rules
